text.content: Elegant, no? üòÉ You take a sliver-moon of just the right proportions, double it once so that the resulting duo has the same rotational symmetry as an S, double it again so that you‚Äôve got what looks like a 4-bladed fan, then double once more, twisting the double so that its blades perfectly overlap the first fan to form what appears to be an impossibly-circular snip of rope. Lovely.
